text: Song Bok-hee (; April 27, 1927 â€“ June 8, 2022), also known professionally as Song Hae (), was a South Korean television host and singer. He was known as the host of the music show Korea Sings from 1988 until his death in 2022. Song died at a hospital in Seoul, South Korea on June 8, 2022 from pneumonia, aged 95. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:South Korean singers Category:South Korean comedians Category:Television presenters Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Song Hae
